Package oop.cw.ticketing.service

Class TicketManagerService

java.lang.Object
oop.cw.ticketing.service.TicketManagerService
@Service public class TicketManagerService extends Object
Service class that manages the ticket pool and coordinates the threads for vendors and customers. The TicketManagerService is responsible for initializing the ticket pool configuration, starting the vendor and customer threads, and stopping those threads when necessary. This service uses Spring's Service annotation to handle the ticket pool management and interact with vendors and customers through thread management.

  • Method Details

    • setCustomers

      public void setCustomers(List<Customer> customers)

    • setVendors

      public void setVendors(List<Vendor> vendors)

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initializes the ticket pool configuration by loading it from a configuration file and setting up the event, ticket capacity, customer retrieval rate, and ticket release rate. It also loads the customer and vendor lists from the configuration.
      Throws:
      ConfigurationException - if the configuration loading fails.

    • startThreads

      public void startThreads() throws ThreadManagementException
      Starts the threads for all vendors and customers. Each vendor and customer is assigned a thread to simulate their actions, and all threads are started concurrently.
      Throws:
      ThreadManagementException - if there is an issue with managing the threads.

    • stopThreads

      public void stopThreads()
